sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
Using componendo and dividendo, find the value of \(z \) given that 
\[
	\frac{\sqrt{6 z + 2 } + \sqrt{6 z - 3 }}{\sqrt{6 z + 2 } - \sqrt{6 z - 3 }} = 2 
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "The given equation is 
\[
	\frac{\sqrt{6 z + 2 } + \sqrt{6 z - 3 }}{\sqrt{6 z + 2 } - \sqrt{6 z - 3 }} = 2 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
By using componendo and dividendo and simplifying, we get
\[
	\frac{\input[s2v1]{} \sqrt{2 6 + z }}{2 \sqrt{2 6 - z }} = \frac{6 + 1 }{\input[s2v2]{} - 1 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{\sqrt{2 z + 2 }}{\sqrt{6 z - 3 }} = \frac{3 }{1 }
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{6 z + 2 }{6 z - 3 } = \frac{\input[s3v1]{} }{1 }
\]
Now, cross multiplying and simplifying, we get
\[
	6 z + 2 = \input[s3v2]{} z - 27 
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 48 z = \input[s4v1]{}
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow z = \frac{29 }{\input[s4v2]{} }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [2, 3], "text": "$$\text{Upon applying componendo and dividendo on $\frac{\sqrt{6 z + 2 } + \sqrt{6 z - 3 }}{\sqrt{6 z + 2 } - \sqrt{6 z - 3 }} = 2 $, we get $\frac{\sqrt{6 z + 2 }}{\sqrt{6 z - 3 }} = \frac{3 }{1 }$}$$ "}, {"data": [9, 54], "text": "$$\{Further simplification of the previous equation gives us the result $6 z + 2 = 54 z - 27 $}$$ "}, {"data": [29, 48], "text": "$$\text{Finally, we get the result $z = \frac{29 }{48 }$}$$"}]
